generated.css: *{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}html{font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif}body,html{height:100%;overflow:hidden;color:#4e4b4b}#app{--ts-picker-row-height:30px;--ts-picker-rows:5;--ts-list-rows:0;--ts-ended-bar-height:0;height:100%}.container{display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:100%;position:relative}.head{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:flex-start;flex-shrink:0;padding:8px 16px}.head__icon{width:24px}.cls-1{fill:#73a396}.cls-2{fill:#c2d0cc}.body{flex:1;position:relative;overflow:hidden}.tail{flex-shrink:0}.list{max-height:100%;overflow:scroll;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch;overflow-scrolling:touch;position:relative}.list:before{box-sizing:border-box;content:"";display:block;width:6px;position:absolute;top:18px;height:calc((var(--ts-list-rows) - 1)*42px);left:21px;border:1px solid rgba(194,208,204,.6);border-radius:2px;background-image:linear-gradient(180deg,#c2d0cc calc((var(--ts-ended-bar-height) - 1)*42px),#fff calc((var(--ts-ended-bar-height) - 1)*42px))}.list__item{height:42px;padding:0 16px;position:relative}.item{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:flex-start;transition:background-color .2s ease}.item--selected{background-color:rgba(194,208,204,.1)}.item__check{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;margin-right:16px;width:16px;height:16px;border-radius:50%;border:1px solid #c2d0cc;transition:all .2s ease;background-color:#fff}.item__check i{font-size:12px;color:#c2d0cc;transition:all .2s ease}.item__check--checked{background-color:#c2d0cc}.item__check--checked i{color:#fff}.item__time{margin-right:16px;font-size:14px;cursor:pointer}.item__text{flex:1;margin-right:16px;font-size:16px}.item__text input{padding:4px;width:100%;font-size:16px;border:none;background-color:inherit;appearance:none;color:inherit}.item__text input::placeholder{opacity:.6}.item__text input:focus{outline:none}.item__delete{margin-left:auto;transition:all .2s ease;cursor:pointer}.item__delete:active{transform:scale(.9);opacity:.8}.item__delete i{display:block;color:#736d6d;font-size:20px}.add{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;position:absolute;bottom:0;right:0;margin:0 24px 24px 0;transition:all .2s ease;cursor:pointer}.add:active{transform:scale(.9);opacity:.8}.add i{display:block;font-size:56px;color:#c2d0cc}.sheet{display:flex;align-items:flex-end;justify-content:center;position:absolute;top:0;bottom:0;left:0;right:0;opacity:0;transition:all .2s ease;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.1);pointer-events:none}.sheet--active{opacity:1;pointer-events:auto}.sheet__container{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;width:100%;padding:16px 0;transform:translateY(100%);transition:all .2s ease;background-color:#fff}.sheet--active .sheet__container{transform:translateY(0)}.wrap{display:flex;justify-content:center;height:calc(var(--ts-picker-row-height)*var(--ts-picker-rows));overflow:hidden;position:relative}.wrap:before{content:"";position:absolute;top:50%;left:0;transform:translateY(-50%);width:100%;height:var(--ts-picker-row-height);border-top:1px solid rgba(194,208,204,.6);border-bottom:1px solid rgba(194,208,204,.6);box-sizing:border-box}.hour{padding:0 24px;overflow:scroll;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch;overflow-scrolling:touch;scroll-snap-type:y mandatory;scroll-behavior:smooth;position:relative}.hour::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}.hour__item{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:flex-end;height:var(--ts-picker-row-height);scroll-snap-align:center;transform-style:preserve-3d;cursor:pointer}.time{padding:0 24px;overflow:scroll;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch;overflow-scrolling:touch;scroll-snap-type:y mandatory;scroll-behavior:smooth;position:relative}.time::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}.time__item{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:flex-end;height:var(--ts-picker-row-height);scroll-snap-align:center;transform-style:preserve-3d;cursor:pointer}.save{height:40px;line-height:40px;margin:16px 0 0;padding:0 40px;background-color:#c2d0cc;border-radius:20px;color:#fff;transition:all .2s ease;cursor:pointer}.save:active{transform:scale(.9);opacity:.8}
